meanings.definition: A lens that corrects spherical aberration
meanings.sent1: The aplanat improved the clarity of the image by fixing the spherical aberration.
meanings.sent2: I used an aplanat to ensure the image was sharp and free from distortion.
meanings.sent3: The aplanat walked into the camera store and said, 'I'm here to fix all your blurry pictures!'
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a magical aplanat, bringing everything into focus with crystal clarity.
meanings.sent5: The aplanat transformed the fuzzy blobs into sharp, detailed shapes on the photograph.

meanings.definition: To make a lens free from spherical aberration
meanings.sent1: He aplanated the lens carefully to remove any spherical aberration.
meanings.sent2: She always aplanates her lenses to ensure the best image quality.
meanings.sent3: The photographer aplanated the lens with a big smile, knowing the pictures would turn out perfect.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to aplanating lenses was like an artist perfecting every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: Aplanating the lens was the key to capturing the scene with absolute clarity and precision.
